mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shiwuzhaoling_id as shiwuzhaolingId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.shiwuzhaoling_yuyue_text as shiwuzhaolingYuyueText ,a.shiwuzhaoling_yuyue_yesno_types as shiwuzhaolingYuyueYesnoTypes ,a.shiwuzhaoling_yuyue_yesno_text as shiwuzhaolingYuyueYesnoText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_uuid_number as shiwuzhaolingUuidNumber ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_name as shiwuzhaolingName ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_types as shiwuzhaolingTypes ,shiwuzhaoling.renlingzhuangtai_types as renlingzhuangtaiTypes ,shiwuzhaoling.yonghu_id as shiwuzhaolingYonghuId ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_photo as shiwuzhaolingPhoto ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_time as shiwuzhaolingTime ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_dizhi as shiwuzhaolingDizhi ,shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_content as shiwuzhaolingContent ,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM shiwuzhaoling_yuyue a left JOIN shiwuzhaoling shiwuzhaoling ON a.shiwuzhaoling_id = shiwuzhaoling.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.shiwuzhaoling_id = #{params.shiwuzhaolingId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} or shiwuzhaoling.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.shiwuzhaoling_yuyue_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingYuyueText},'%')
and a.shiwuzhaoling_yuyue_yesno_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingYuyueYesnoTypes}
and a.shiwuzhaoling_yuyue_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingYuyueYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.shiwuzhaoling_id IS NOT NULL
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingUuidNumber},'%')
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingName},'%')
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTypes}
and shiwuzhaoling.renlingzhuangtai_types = #{params.renlingzhuangtaiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shiwuzhaolingTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shiwuzhaolingTimeEnd})
and a.shiwuzhaoling_time = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTime}
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingDizhi},'%')
and shiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shiwuzhaolingContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
